scenario: You touched a doorknob and feel intense fear about germs. You want to wash your hands repeatedly until it feels 'just right.'
targets: Name the OCD cycle (obsession → anxiety → compulsion → short relief)
Suggest one small ERP experiment (delay or reduce one step)

scenario: Before leaving home, you check the stove many times. Even after checking, you feel doubt and return to check again.
targets: Reflect the pattern and its cost
Offer a tiny experiment (reduce checking by one round)

scenario: You have an intrusive harm thought that scares you. You worry it means something about who you are.
targets: Normalize intrusive thoughts as thoughts (not intent)
Offer one small practice (labeling the thought)
